description: Pray bless coin (PBCoin) is the latest smart contract token based on the value generated by the e-shop of blockchain. PBCoin is based on the price of real assets to ensure the price stability of PBCoin. With the increase of the income of the mall, the profit premium generated will be purchased by the project party on the trading platform and permanently destroyed through publicity, so as to promote the price growth of PBCoin.PBCoin links shoppers and e-commerce platforms by means of token. Token mall is the embodiment of distributed commerce. Compared with traditional commerce, blockchain e-commerce platform has made subversive innovation in the underlying technology, organizational form, interest connection and production relationship. It has built a decentralized mall with both information and interest, explored the infinite potential of distributed commerce and Token economy, and finally achieved the interconnection of all things .
name: Pray Bless Coin
